sentences.en: " And he's so devoted to Ashley and Beau that I always feel safe having him around. "
sentences.cn: " 而且他那样忠于艾希礼和 小博,所以有他在身边,就觉得安全多了.

sentences.en: Beau was pulling ahead of me with his leash.
sentences.cn: 博套着皮带拽着我走在前面.

sentences.en: Ever Saturday, she heads over with her beau to catch a movie.
sentences.cn: 每个星期六, 她和她的男朋友去看电影.

sentences.en: Every Saturday, she heads over with her beau to catch a movie.
sentences.cn: 每个星期六她和她的男朋友都要去看一场电影.

sentences.en: Go tell Pork to hitch up the carriage and take you over to play with Beau . "
sentences.cn: 去告诉波克,让他套车送你到那边跟 小博 一起玩去.

sentences.en: He is my beau ideal of a soldier.
sentences.cn: 他是我理想中最好的战士.

sentences.en: He was Maybelle Merriwether's especial beau , Rene Picard.
sentences.cn: 他是梅贝尔-梅里韦瑟的昵友, 名叫雷内-皮卡德.

sentences.en: He was Suellen's beau and he loved her, not me.
sentences.cn: 他是苏安琳的爱人,他爱的人是她, 不是我.

sentences.en: I'd have died in Atlanta when Beau came if it hadn't been for her!
sentences.cn: 我生小博的时候,要不是她,我就死在亚特兰大了.

sentences.en: If Beau can give an extra ten minutes, surely I can too.
sentences.cn: 如果博能耐心再待10分钟, 那么我也能.

sentences.en: Mary told her beau she was through with him.
sentences.cn: 玛丽告诉男友说,她俩关系就此结束.

sentences.en: Parsons. The markings , called Beau's Lines sometimes appear when the body is particularly stressed.
sentences.cn: 这样的纹路称为博氏线(Beau'sLine),在人体承受极大压力的情况下时有出现.

sentences.en: Questions vary wildly from the political and the literary to the intimately personal — the magazine features one annoyed girlfriend asking her beau when he’s finally going to marry her.
sentences.cn: 问题多样而狂野，从政治、文学到个人私密——杂志专载了一位晕火的女孩，她问她的情郎什么时候敲定娶她。

sentences.en: She appeared with her new beau.
Surprising as that may be, more surprising was that Beau never moved either.
sentences.cn: 这已经令人感到意外,可更使我吃惊的是博也一动不动.

sentences.en: The magnificent beau is dancing to the light of chandeliers.
sentences.cn: 这个衣着华丽的花花公子在枝形吊灯灯光下翩翩起舞。

sentences.en: Wang Ping: Therefore, someone says tennis is an art which beau - tifies life.
sentences.cn: 王平: 所以有人说,网球是美化生活的艺术!

words.tran_cn: 花花公子；喜修饰者；情郎

trans.tran_cn: 喜修饰者，纨绔子弟，情郎，求爱者
trans.tran_en: A woman's beau is her boyfriend or lover
